bib.abstract: A statistical model trained on a manually an- notated corpus using a Conditional Random Fields modeling (Lafferty et  Both statistical models were trained on the KPWr corpus (Broda et al., 2012)  uses a subset of 82 categories and their list can be found in Liner2.5 model NER.3
